item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 7, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Malaysia started mandating ISPs to redirect DNS queries to local servers (14 points | 5 comments)
2. Hardware Acceleration of LLMs: A comprehensive survey and comparison (140 points | 18 comments)

14. Boeing Starliner, leaving its crew behind, lands in New Mexico (15 points | 8 comments)

23. Oya, I've heard of mega-ROMs (76 points | 6 comments)

26. The heiress at Harvard who helped revolutionize murder investigations (3 points | discuss)
27. Understanding the Layout Process in Qt Widgets (47 points | 29 comments)

29. Goja: A Golang JavaScript Runtime (72 points | 27 comments)
